creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
When all properties are desired (*) to be loaded
and the property being loaded is going to be placed in a list
rather than a corresponding value, this call fails to read the
data from the web page. 

This will probably work the same in any OS.

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
There isn't enough detail to duplicate this bug. Marking as "invalid".
Some testing shows that jsp:setProperty with property="*" for an indexed
property is working in Tomcat 3.2.3 and Tomcat 3.3.
